summary: This cable discusses a Miami Herald article by James Buchanan which alleges Manuel Ray has replaced Miro as the leader of Cuban exiles with the backing of several Latin American leaders and the United States. The article is causing concern among Cuban exiles, and the cable suggests the need to discredit Buchanan's story and reassure Miro.
title: IN 41885: MIAMI HERALD ARTICLE ON MIRO AND MANUEL RAY
